Message:
I was born into a family of knights,
and have undergone the most
rigorous of training
since I was a child.

But in the midst of my training,
I awakened to my power as a witch,
and was driven out of my home.

If there’s no place in
this world for me...
I might as well...

As that thought
ran through my mind,
she appeared before me.

She smiled at me with
eyes full of love,
as if shielding me
from gazes of disdain.

It was this moment that
I made my decision.
I will live as her—
